primitives

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • primitives.Ray

  • public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Ray is the class representing a Ray in Cartesian The class is based on Point3D class and Vector class Point 3D start point _p0 Vector the direction of Ray _dir
    Author:
    Batya Tamsot and Nehora Levy
